settings.left_content: Assembly instructions for Solo Pod / Phone Booth
settings.right_content: Assembly instructions for M, LRG and XL pods

settings.left_content: Assembly instructions for Folio Phone Booth
settings.custom_html:
<script>
  $(document).ready(function(){
   $('.page-all-grid-0-btn').on('click', function(e){
      if (window.location.href.indexOf("/sv-se") > -1) {
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'WbTNYC']);
      } else if (window.location.href.indexOf("/de-de") > -1) {
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'Xwzazg']);
      } else if (window.location.href.indexOf("/no-no") > -1) {
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'XrVUdS']);
      } else if (window.location.href.indexOf("/fr-fr") > -1) {
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'T9rQeT']);
      } else if (window.location.href.indexOf("/nl-nl") > -1) {
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'XrVUdS']);
      } else if (window.location.href.indexOf("/nl-be") > -1) {
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'VySLmZ']);
      } else if (window.location.href.indexOf("/fr-be") > -1) {
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'UedqMm']);
      } else if (window.location.href.indexOf("/de-at") > -1) {
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'R4k49B']);
      } else if (window.location.href.indexOf("/es-es") > -1) {
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'Xc49bG']);
      }else{
              window._klOnsite = window._klOnsite || [];
              window._klOnsite.push(['openForm', 'VQrxxM']);
      }
    });
  })
</script>

settings.title: Step inside a booth
settings.description: We'd love for you to see a Sound box store. Visit our UK or Spanish showroom or schedule a virtual tour to see the booths for yourself.
